body.name: Evenflo Stroller Rider Board, Convenient Riding Options, Non-Skid Surface, Smooth-Ride Wheels, Easy to Use, Holds up to 50 Pounds, No Additional Parts Needed - 1 Count (Pack of 1)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 19 hrs 36 mins
FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 19 hrs 36 mins
features: DURABLE STROLLER RIDER BOARD: The Evenflo Stroller Rider Board is a durable platform that allows you to customize your stroller for the needs of growing children, providing space for an extra child to stand and ride along with siblings.

CONVENIENT RIDING OPTIONS: This riding platform is designed for single or double strollers and gives children the option to ride or stand. Compatible with the Evenflo Pivot Xpand modular Stroller, Pivot Xpand modular Travel System and Evenflo Gold SensorSafe Pivot Xpand Smart Modular Travel System (IS NOT COMPATABLE WITH THE REGULAR PIVOT TRAVEL SYSTEM)

EASY TO USE: Our stroller rider board is exceptionally simple to use. It clicks easily onto the back of the stroller’s frame without the need for any additional tools or parts. It holds up to 50 pounds and delivers a smooth ride.

DESIGNED FOR SAFETY: The Evenflo Stroller Rider Board has been designed for optimal safety. The smooth-ride wheels have been added for a comfortable and smooth ride, and the non-skid surface is designed with sleek wood applique.

TRUSTED FOR NEARLY 100 YEARS: Evenflo has been a trusted source of well-built child safety systems for almost 100 years. The real-life designs put into each of our products have been engineered for everyday use.
body.description: As children grow out of their strollers, finding the perfect in-between that helps them move from riding to walking can be a challenge. Evenflo has been on the cutting edge of technology for nearly 100 years, but we have never forgotten our ultimate goal of creating real-world solutions that help parents every day. The Evenflo Stroller Rider Board is a durable platform for kids that allows you to customize your stroller for their growing needs, providing space for an extra child to stand and ride along with siblings. Our riding platform is designed for single or double strollers and gives children the option to ride or stand. It also permits children to stretch their legs when they’ve been sitting too long or to take a break from walking. Plus, it folds easily and stores out of the way when not in use.Our stroller rider board is exceptionally simple to use. It clicks easily onto the back of the stroller’s frame without the need for any additional tools or parts. It holds up to 50 pounds and delivers a comfortable and safe ride. The Evenflo Stroller Rider Board has been designed for optimal safety. The smooth-ride wheels have been added for a comfortable and smooth ride, and the non-skid surface is designed with sleek wood applique. With the rider board attached, older children can easily hop on or off when their little legs need a break from walking. The board can also be easily removed with a simple push-button release.For almost a century, Evenflo has been a leader in safety, innovation, and education and a trusted source of precision-manufactured, high-quality child safety equipment that is engineered for real-life situations. In addition, all Evenflo car seats and strollers include ParentLink customer-service perks like real-time chat and free live video installation support.

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: product, product labels, and instruction manuals before use. Cleaning Instructions: Clean minor spills and stains on cloth, vinyl or plastic surfaces with cold water and mild soap. Air dry. On models with removable seat pads, machine wash them separately in cold water–delicate cycle. NO chlorine bleach. Tumble dry 10 – 15 minutes on low heat, remove immediately. DO NOT iron or dry clean. Metal and plastic parts can be wiped clean with a soft damp cloth and dried with a soft cloth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy hop on, hop off option for my toddler. Fits perfect with my evenflo double stroller. My toddler also loves the flexibility it offers. Would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the older kids
reviews.reviewText: My special needs grandchild LOVES riding on this. I love that I can keep him near me while pushing his little sister in the stroller. It’s so easy to pop on and off, nothing complicated about it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My son absolutely loves it!
reviews.reviewText: This little board is perfect for long days out with the family. This reduces the whining and the crankiness from my tired 6 year old.I would recommend if you have a baby and a bigger kit and you want to be able to keep everyone in your main line of sight when moving around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gets the job done
reviews.reviewText: This is convenient and easy to install, but has some issues. I bought this to go along with the Pivot Xpand so that my 4 year old could stand and ride along with my two year old and my soon-to-be infant. It works out well when the stroller is in a single configuration, but once it becomes a double stroller, it is very uncomfortable for my oldest son. If I have the infant seat in the top position, he basically has to squat to use the board at all. Some configurations give him more room, but they’re not the most convenient for the other two…In addition, this thing rattles like crazy. I’ve only taken it out in a single configuration since baby 3 isn’t here yet. It is very noisy and rattles a lot, which seems to be exclusive to the board (when the board is folded up, I get a very smooth ride). This doesn’t change whether my son is on the board or not—it is constantly noisy.I also had a hard time figuring out how to install the storage strap. The instructions were confusing, and I could not find any instructional videos, so I am unsure if I installed correctly or not.All in all, I’m glad I bought it, because I don’t know what else I would do with three small kids, I just wish it would have been designed better to make it a triple stroller… not just a board for the single configuration.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This thing is amazing
reviews.reviewText: My 3.5 yr old refuses to get into a stroller seat, but gets tired after 10 min of walking, and this add-on saved a weekend trip to Gatlinburg, TN! We spent 6+ hours walking on sidewalks, cobblestone streets, uneven ground and even did a quick fold up to go on a tram and this little contraption did amazing! He loved riding on his “skateboard” and it made it fun for him, and easy on us. Highly recommend for the active toddler who wants to hop on and off as needed too. Durable to boot!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Is not compatible with Evenflo Pivot stroller
reviews.reviewText: I wanted this to work so badly but it is not compatible with the Evenflo Pivot stroller. Must be for Pivot Xpand only. Which is crazy because they are set up the exact same so they should have made this work for both Pivot strollers. Will be returning and will continue my search for something for my toddler to ride on without having to buy another stroller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s ok- it’s helpful for my kids to take turns riding on but it’s very loud, sticks out pretty far so you have to kind of walk to the side. I think if it was half the price I would give it more stars. But I paid way too much for this. It’s only ok

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I bought this item for my daughter to use with her Evenflo stroller. She flew home with 4 children and had a connection in a busy airport. I asked her how it worked out traveling by airplane and making connections.She said ; good quality, survived gate checking & baggage handlers, easy to attach & remove, although was unnecessary as it has a strap to keep in closed position. Her 5 & 7 year olds were able to ride on the board through the airports. It was a little harder to push with their weight but that is to be expected. Her comment was "Best attachment ever". I personally, thought is was reasonably priced for a stroller attachment.
Worth it after just one use. My son loves it!! Wish it were less expensive.
HolaNo quedo apto para mi carriola una chico bravoEsta muy cortoPero esta de muy buena calidad el producto
Easily snaps on, is stable, doesn’t get in the way of my feet when I’m pushing the stroller, and the boy loves it! Price is also great here, thanks Amazon

Great product! I’ve been using it for almost three months now and am SO happy I purchased it.Easy to snap on, my toddlers (3,2) can do it themselves. Makes pushing the stroller a bit challenging at first (tips of feet kept hitting it) but after a few outings I was used to it and would no longer hit it.I usually use the board when our evenflo stroller is set up as a double (car seat and additional seat) and can easily go for a walk with all three kids loaded.

reviews.reviewTitle: No le quedó pero devolvió dinero..sin quejas
reviews.reviewText: Bonito.. no le quedó a mi carriola xq le estobaba el freno.. pero me devolvió x completo mi dinero
